http://www.bittorrent.com/faq.myt#mixedupfiles
not yet I was up to 53

It doesn't work like that - it's not downloading one episode at a time, it's downloading various pieces from various files and storing them in a random order. It'll only reorder all of these pieces once the download has finished (or once you've forced it to - read the BitTorrent FAQ).
